item.description:
Join The Boston Internet Marketing Meetup and the American Marketing Association/Boston Social Media team for a fun Saturday afternoon of networking on the top deck of legendary Woodman's of Essex. Learn great social media tips and tricks from the experts, learn from peers how they're doing social media in their organization, and come enjoy the view with many of Boston's leading marketers! We'll have Joselin Mane of BostonTweetUp.com joining us to delve deep into the land of Twitter and help us figure out how to put this cool technology to better use.

So all you members looking for that great networking/cocktails opportunity here's one for ya!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be on the TOP DECK level
item.name: Twittering Away at Woodmans - Social Media Saturday
